business_plan.business_strategy: Acme Inc. aims to become a leading provider of industrial machinery in the UK by offering high-quality products at competitive prices. Our strategy includes expanding our product line and entering new markets.
business_plan.products_or_services: We manufacture and sell a range of industrial machinery, including conveyor belts, assembly lines, and packaging equipment.
business_plan.target_market: Our target market consists of manufacturers in the UK, particularly those in the food and beverage, automotive, and aerospace industries.
business_plan.competition: Our main competitors are other manufacturers of industrial machinery, including companies such as XYZ Manufacturing and ABC Industrial Equipment.

loan_purpose: Acme Inc. is seeking a loan of GBP 500,000 to purchase new manufacturing equipment and expand our product line.
